name: Dreamest - Nature Sounds
description: The best application for relaxing moments (night, nap or relaxation). Essential to reduce anxiety, nervousness or insomnia. This application will instantly transport you to a natural and calm atmosphere for soothing dreams. The high quality sound effect, are selected to give maximum relaxation. The largest selection of sounds! New sounds are added regularly. features: - Sound list (playlist) by theme: rain, storm, sea, forest, animals. - Sound combination for simultaneous sounds create unique dreams! - Timer: to close the application when you fall asleep (and save battery). - Implementation translated into over 80 languages
